meanings.sent1: Her skin looked ashiest after spending a day at the beach.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the students, she had the ashiest complexion.
meanings.sent3: The ghost in the movie had the ashiest face, making everyone scream.
meanings.sent4: The old building's walls were the ashiest, resembling charcoal.
meanings.sent5: The fireplace left behind the ashiest residue, covering everything in a fine layer of dust.

meanings.sent1: After playing in the ashes, his hands were the ashiest of all.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house on the corner was the ashiest building in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The witch's cauldron produced the ashiest smoke, creating a spooky atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The volcano's eruption left the sky looking the ashiest it had ever been.
meanings.sent5: The campfire's embers glowed the ashiest red, lighting up the night.
